data.title: The Passion Of New Eve, Angela Carter (Paperback)
data.meta_description: 'Her Imagination was one of the most dazzling this century' MARINA WALKER, INDEPENDENT 'The way to Carter's visionary and lurid wo...
data.text:
THE PASSION OF NEW EVE is an extraordinary journey into the apocalyptic vision of the author Lorna Sage called 'The boldest of English writers'.

The Passion of New Eve is an extraordinary journey through mythology and sexuality by the award-winning author Angela Carter.
